mapper.insert: insert into r_comment (review_num, r_comment_content, user_num) values (#{reviewNum}, #{rCommentContent}, #{userNum})
mapper.select: select rc.*,u.user_id from r_comment rc join users u on rc.user_num = u.user_num where rc.review_num = #{reviewNum} order by rc.r_comment_time desc
mapper.update: update r_comment set r_comment_content = #{rCommentContent} where r_comment_num = #{rCommentNum}
